eqnarray:
egin{eqnarray}
X \equiv G^{\mu
u}\partial_\mu T \partial_
u  ar{T}, \quad Y \equiv
|G^{\mu
u}\partial_\mu T\partial_
u T|^2 .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
  T = T_{\rm  sol}(y_0, y_1),\quad
&&y_0 \equiv \frac{1}{\beta_0} \Bigl( x_0 - t_0(x_{\hat{\mu}} )\Bigr),
\quad
y_1 \equiv \frac{1}{\beta_1} \Bigl( x_1 - t_1(x_{\hat{\mu}})\Bigr)\\
&&x \to y = \Lambda x , \quad (\Lambda^t) G \Lambda = G,
\label{lorentz}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
X^0 & = & t \nonumber\\
X^1 & = & r(t) \cos  \theta \nonumber\\
X^2 & = & r(t) \sin  \theta \cos  \phi
\label{S3inducedmetric}
\\
X^3 & = & r(t) \sin  \theta \sin  \phi \nonumber\\
X^4 & = & \chi \nonumber\\
F_{t \chi} & = & E(t) \nonumber % & = & E_\chi (t)
\

\begin{eqnarray}
X^0 & = & t \nonumber \\
X^1 & = & r(t) \cos  \theta \nonumber \\
X^2 & = & r(t) \sin  \theta \cos  \phi \nonumber \\
X^3 & = & r(t) \sin  \theta \sin  \phi \label{paraeb}\\
X^4 & = & \chi \nonumber \\
F_{t \chi} & = & E(t)
\nonumber \\
\quad F_{\theta \phi} & = & b \sin \theta \ . \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 X^0 & =& X^0 (x^1,x^2,x^3) \nonumber \\
 X^1 & =& x^1 \nonumber \\
 X^2 & =& x^2 \nonumber \\
 X^3 & =& x^3 \\
 X^4 & =& \chi \nonumber \\
 F_{a\chi} & = & \partial_b A_\chi(x^1,x^2,x^3) \nonumber \\
 F_{ab} & = & F_{ab}(x^1,x^2,x^3) \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
L& =& \sqrt{\det (\delta_{ij} - \partial_i X^0 \partial_j X^0 + F_{ij})}
\\
&=&
\left[1-(\partial_a X^0)^2 + (F_{a\chi})^2 + (F_{ab})^2/4 +
(\partial_a X^0F_{a\chi})^2
\right.
\nonumber
\\
& & \hspace{30mm} \left. - (\partial_a X^0)^2(F_{b\chi})^2 -
(\epsilon^{abc}F_{bc}\partial_a X^0)^2/4 +
(\epsilon^{abc}F_{bc}F_{a\chi})^2/4 \right]^{1/2} \ . \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
P_r & = & r^2 \sin \theta
\frac{\dot{r}[1-B^2]}{\sqrt{-1+\dot{r}^2+B^2-B^2 \dot{r}^2}} \ , \\
H\equiv \int\! d\chi d\theta d\phi \left[ P_r \dot{r}- L \right]
 & =& \int\! d\chi d\theta d\phi \;
r^2 \sin \theta \frac{-1+B^2}{\sqrt{-1+\dot{r}^2+B^2-B^2
\dot{r}^2}} \ .
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\oint d\tau \left( F_{1\chi} X^1 \frac{\partial}{\partial \tau} X^\chi
+ V X^1 \frac{\partial}{\partial\sigma}X^0 \right)
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&  \partial_\sigma X^1 - F_{1\chi} \partial_\tau X^\chi - V\partial_\sigma X^0=0,
\nonumber\\
&& \partial_\sigma X^\chi +F_{1\chi} \partial_\tau X^1 =0,
\label{bccond}\\
&& \partial_\tau X^0 - V \partial_\tau X^1=0.
\nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&  \partial_\sigma X^2 - i \tilde{F}_{23} \partial_\tau X^3 =0, \quad
 \partial_\sigma X^3 +i \tilde{F}_{23} \partial_\tau X^2 =0,
\\
&& \partial_\tau X^0 - V \partial_\tau X^1=0, \quad V \partial_\sigma X^0 -
\partial_\sigma X^1=0,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
S\!\!&&={2T_{\rm  D9}}\int\! dx_0 \;e^{-(ax_0+t_2)^2} \int d^9x
\Big[
1-a^2 +(\partial_i
t_1)^2 +(\partial_i t_2)^2
\bigg.
\nonumber \\
&& \hspace{5mm}
+p_1 \Big(a^4-2a^2(\partial_i t_1)^2-2a^2(\partial_i t_2)^2 \Big)
+p_2 \Big(a^4-2a^2(\partial_i t_1)^2+2a^2(\partial_i t_2)^2 \Big)
\Big]
\nonumber
\\
&&={2T_{\rm  D9}}\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{a} \int d^9x e^{-t_2^2} \Big[
\frac{2}{3}(2-a^2) -\frac{2-a^2}{a^2} (\partial_i
t_1)^2+(1-2a^2p_1+2a^2p_2) (\partial_i t_2)^2
\nonumber
\\
&& \hspace{35mm}
+\big((\partial t)^4\rm{term}\big) \Big].
\label{tsac}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 H \hspace{-15pt}&&={\cal T}_2 \exp\left[
-\pi (\sinh\gamma\sqrt{G_{11}} x^1)^2
\right]
\sqrt{-\det (\eta + F)}\;
2(\dot{T})^2 \frac{\delta {\cal F}(z)}{\delta z}
\nonumber\\
&& =
{\cal T}_2 \exp\left[
-\pi(\sinh\gamma\sqrt{G_{11}} x^1)^2
\right]
\sqrt{1\!  +\! F_{1\chi}^2}
\; 2(\cosh^2\gamma) ({T}_{\rm cl}')^2
\frac{\delta {\cal F}(z)}{\delta z}
\nonumber\\
&& =
{\cal T}_2 \exp\left[
-\pi (\sinh\gamma\sqrt{G_{11}} x^1)^2
\right]
\sqrt{1\!  +\! F_{1\chi}^2}
\; 2(\cosh^2\gamma)
\frac{1}{\frac{2{\cal T}_2}{\cal E} \exp\left[
-\pi (\sinh\gamma \sqrt{G_{11}}x^1)^2
\right]}\nonumber \\
&&
= {\cal E}\sqrt{1+F_{1\chi}^2} \cosh^2\gamma.
\label{bakene}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 z = -1 - \sqrt{\frac{{\cal T}_2}{\cal E}}
\exp \left[
-\frac{\pi}{2} (\sinh\gamma \sqrt{G_{11}} x^1)^2
\right]
-\frac{{\cal T}_2}{\cal E}
\exp \left[
-\pi (\sinh\gamma \sqrt{G_{11}} x^1)^2
\right]
+ \mbox {higher}.
\
